A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was rather excited to see the last Jedi and see how they filled in some of the plot holes and questions left over from the the force awakens.  I was very disappointed and rather pissed off how they handled this movie from a story and pacing point.  I don't like how ray had no force training and almost none in this movie and was as powerful as kylo ren who has trained his whole life.  I don't like that she has no lineage to speak of.  I was very pissed off how Snoke was built up like the emperor and had very little pay off and almost no back story.  I was incredibly disappointed how Luke very uncharacteristically got cynical and basically did nothing\, no real training no fighting.  Then had simply died from basically force exhaustion.  And not to mention I don't think Adam Driver was a good fit for Kylo Ren from the beginning. He's not scary and his bonefidas was quite damaged when he basically lost to a girl in the last movie who never held a light saber before.  I have no idea how disney can do such a good job with marvel but have to put soo much political correctness in a star was story without actually making it even good because of it.
